# GitHub Tech Radar

> AI-Powered Daily Intelligence Briefing for GitHub.

## Summary
GitHub Tech Radar is a local, privacy-focused tool that helps developers track trending GitHub repositories, discover hidden high-potential projects ("Hidden Gems"), and follow industry experts ("Gurus"). It uses local LLMs (Ollama/Llama 3.2) to analyze codebases and translate insights.

## Core Features
- **Smart Hybrid Search**: Understands cross-language queries (e.g., "AI Assistant" -> "LLM Agent") and specific product names.
- **Hidden Gems Mining**: Identifies high-quality, low-star (50-2000 stars) repositories using heuristic filters (recent activity, size) and AI analysis.
- **MCP Server Support**: Exposes GitHub intelligence skills (search, trending, mining) to Claude Desktop and other AI Agents via Model Context Protocol.
- **Multilingual UI & Translation**: Real-time AI translation for project descriptions and insights (7 languages).
- **Privacy First**: Runs completely locally using Ollama.
- **Cross-Platform**: Web Dashboard + Mac Menu Bar App.

## Technical Stack
- **Language**: Python 3.10+
- **Web Framework**: Flask
- **GUI**: Rumps (macOS)
- **AI Engine**: Ollama (Local), OpenAI API (Optional fallback)
- **Data Source**: GitHub REST API (Public)

## Quick Start
```bash
git clone https://github.com/HenryZhang428/GitHub-Tech-Radar.git
pip install -r requirements.txt
python src/web_server.py
```

## Project Structure
- `src/web_server.py`: Main Flask application.
- `src/scraper.py`: GitHub API interaction logic (Trending, Search, Hidden Gems).
- `src/llm.py`: AI interface for Ollama/OpenAI (Analysis, Translation, Query Expansion).
- `src/cache_manager.py`: Data persistence layer (JSON).
- `src/data/gurus.json`: Curated list of tech influencers.
